title: WTB - Graded Polar Bears PSA or SGC 4 or higher
author: T206Cards

posts.post_title: WTB - Graded Polar Bears PSA or SGC 4 or higher
posts.post_content: Building my Polar Bear set and looking for graded PSA or SGC 4 or higher.  Just starting this so need most.  Willing to pay slightly above comps or will trade in your favor.  I have thousands of T206 to offer in trade.
